repo.name: LSPosed Module Repository
repo.description: This is a repository of apps to be used with F-Droid. Applications in this repository are official binaries built by the original application developers and released on the official github pages. It syncs with https://modules.lsposed.org/.

application.name: Activity链式启动管理器
application.summary: 叼毛广告，休想通过摇摇启动APP Tools that block activity startup
application.desc:

修复部分APP拦截住出现闪退的问题
可能性修复部分App弹出对话框出现严重卡顿的情况（不确定）
MD5: A9AA30BACE96445A4F26D631284D66F0

application.name: IGExperiments
application.desc:
Version 3 - What's New

  • 🚀 Auto Mode: Automatically detects compatible classes for Instagram versions 334+.
  • 🔔 Update Checker: Get notified when a new module update is available with a direct download link.
  • 🎨 UI Enhancements: Improved user interface for a smoother and more intuitive experience.
  • 🛠️ Separate Hooks Repository: Hooks are now managed in a dedicated repository for easier updates
    Available at: IGExperimentsHooksUpdates
  • 🐛 Bug Fixes: Squashed various bugs to improve stability and performance.

What's Changed

  • Version 3 by @ReSo7200 in xHookman/IGexperiments#43

Full Changelog: xHookman/IGexperiments@v2.5.1...v3.0
application.author: Xposed-Modules-Repo

application.name: smobajump
application.summary: 跳过王者营地的启动动画和推广的界面,版本号带“DisableUpdate”的会屏蔽启动时的自动更新
application.desc:
懒得写操作逻辑了，繁琐，所以整了两个版本，DisableUpdate这个版本会屏蔽启动时的自动更新检查，设置里的手动更新会不会屏蔽不清楚。

不需要屏蔽自动更新的人，可以不更新模块。今早发的有问题，现在重新发。
application.author: Xposed-Modules-Repo

application.name: Tsubonofuta
application.summary: F*ck ChMate's ads
application.desc:
• Adapt to new ChMate version 0.8.10.153 (新しい ChMate バージョン 0.8.10.153 に適応)
  • Change some strings (いくつかのテキストを変更)

If you'll see ads, try to remove the app from list of battery optimizing
(もし広告が見える場合、アプリをバッテリー最適化リストから除外してください)

Make sure to enable this module on Xposed Manager FIRST, overwise it'll be crashing
(はじめに Xposed Manager でこのモジュールを有効化してください、でないとクラッシュします)

Tested on:

  • 2chMate 0.8.10.153/OnePlus/LE2115/12/DR
  • 2chMate 0.8.10.153/OnePlus/ONEPLUS A6000/11/DR

application.name: UC 浏览器代理抓取
application.summary: UC 浏览器免流代理信息抓取
application.desc:
• 现在使用在线配置获取被混淆的字段名进行hook
  • 配置请求使用mirror.ghproxy.com加速无需翻墙
  • 配置仅在当前版本第一次打开时才会下载，只有下载成功模块才会运行
  • 仅支持: UC浏览器(16.2.7.1278)联通和电信
  • 仅支持: UC浏览器极速版(15.5.2.1242)电信
  • 具体支持版本请在 GitHub 主页查看，不定期更新

  • chore: bump androidx.compose.material3:material3 from 1.1.2 to 1.2.1 by @dependabot in xfqwdsj/IAmNotADeveloper#55

  • chore: bump com.android.application from 8.1.2 to 8.3.2 by @dependabot in xfqwdsj/IAmNotADeveloper#57
  • chore: bump com.android.library from 8.1.2 to 8.3.2 by @dependabot in xfqwdsj/IAmNotADeveloper#58

  • docs: update README by @igormiguell in xfqwdsj/IAmNotADeveloper#66
  • chore: 1.2.1 by @xfqwdsj in xfqwdsj/IAmNotADeveloper#69
  • ci: update by @xfqwdsj in xfqwdsj/IAmNotADeveloper#70
